local_intent: Execute the grasp on the bread using the precomputed 'bread_grasp' while aligned; then verify grasp success.
assumptions: Grasp pose 'bread_grasp' has been computed upstream
Gripper is already open and near the target
coherence_with_global: Matches the global pick phase: confirm visibility, approach and align (tolerance 0.005, timeout 1200), ensure pose 'bread_grasp' available, perform Pick with timeout 1500, then verify with IsGraspStable and ObjectInGripper.
